name: Shay Isa
title: AI Strategist & Technology Advisor
tagline: Three decades of cybersecurity leadership. Now exploring the frontier of artificial intelligence.
about:
After more than thirty years leading technical teams and driving business outcomes across the cybersecurity industry — from early network engineering through executive leadership at Fortinet, Palo Alto Networks, and Blue Coat Systems — I've embarked on a new chapter focused on artificial intelligence and its transformative potential.

Since transitioning from corporate leadership, I've built over twenty AI projects spanning agent infrastructure, full-stack platforms, business automation tools, mobile applications, and educational curricula. I apply the same analytical rigor and strategic mindset that defined my corporate career to exploring how AI can reshape business operations, accelerate decision-making, and create new efficiencies — and I remain deeply committed to mentorship and collaboration, helping professionals and organizations navigate this evolving landscape.
